docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Guide to Using Emlid GNSS System for Field Work
docs.text: The Emlids can be used as a base/rover pair or as individual rovers working in parallel to collect cm level data. Below are instructions to configure the Emlids to be used in either configuration.

docs.title: Emlids as Base/Rover Pair
docs.text: Note: Using the Emlids in this configuration will give you the greatest precision and lowest latency corrections, but absolute accuracy may be poor if a local base position is not established

docs.title: Step 1. Setting up Base Station
